pr_title: [JENKINS-61878] Improve the queue/cancelItem endpoint API documentation

timeline.message: [JENKINS-61878] Improve the queue/cancelItem endpoint API documentation

timeline.bodyText: I made the update directly from github UI, it added the trailing line jump automatically, let me know if it's an issue I'll checkout the file from my IDE.
timeline.author: PierreBtz

timeline.bodyText: Suggested change The id of the item to cancel is expected to be passed as a query parameter named id. The id of the item to cancel is expected to be passed as a query parameter named id.
timeline.author: daniel-beck
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@

Canceling the build of an item in the Queue

To programmatically cancel the build of an item in the Queue, post to this URL. - The id of the item to cancel is expected. + The id of the item to cancel is expected to be passed as a query parameter named id.
